name: Tarsal
headline: Data pipeline for your security data lake.
description: Tarsal is a data pipeline custom built for security teams. As security data grows 25% year over year, security teams desperately need access to best-in-class data infrastructure. Tarsal bridges the gap between the modern data stack and security teams, pioneering the modern security data stack.

founders.name: Sunny Rekhi, Founder
founders.description: Prev: full-stack eng @ Zenefits (W13), backend eng @ Uber, infra eng @ TikTok.

# 
One-click 
visibility 
across 
your 
SaaS 
sprawl 
Zero 
maintenance 
connectors 
for your 
SaaS, 
cloud, 
and security logs 
No Code, All Sources, One Smart Pipeline
[Free Trial](https://www.tarsal.co/</get-a-demo/>)[How it Works](https://www.tarsal.co/<#how-it-works>)
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Tarsal-ETL-diagrams-wAxiomweb2.png)
## Security data, wherever you need it
Use the security data platforms of your choice with Tarsal's automatic normalization and pre-built connectors
### Effortless Data Ingestion
Native connectors and schemas for your most important sources.
### Seamless Load to Anywhere
Data Lakes, SIEMs, XDRs -- wherever you need your data, Tarsal has you covered
# Trusted by
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/robinhood-spaced-white.svg)
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/TripActions_Logo2.png)
![UpStart Logo](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/UPST_BIG.D.png)
## Tarsal is...
### Future-proof
Tarsal's infinite scalability means as your organization grows, Tarsal grows with you. 
### No vendor lock-in
Tarsal makes it easy for you to add or switch where you're sending data -- today's SIEM data is tomorrow's data lake data; all with one-click
### Flexible
Keep your SIEM and gradually migrate analytics over to a data lake. You don't have to rip anything out to use Tarsal. 
### Affordable
Your SIEM is one of the biggest line items in your budget. Use Tarsal to send some or all of that data to your data lake.
### Performant
Some analytics just won't run on your SIEM. Use Tarsal to have query-ready data on a data lake.
### No-Code
No code connection from ANY source to EVERY destination
### Normalized
Data in every destination is nomalized to a standard format, regardless of source formats.
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/FigGroup.png)
Tarsal is the first highly scalable ETL data pipeline built for security teams. Easily exfil terabytes of data in just just a few clicks, with instant normalization, and route that data to your desired destination.
## Real Impact for Real Teams
Tarsal customer success stories
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/robinhood-spaced-white.svg)
Managing logs ingested from dozens of SaaS providers, each with its own format, authentication and delivery method is a challenge that required a significant investment of human hours. Tarsal takes away this overhead and enables us to focus on security improvements that are unique to Robinhood. 
David Seidman
Head of Security Operations, Robinhood
[See Case Study](https://www.tarsal.co/<https:/tarsal.co/case-study/robinhood-and-tarsal-revolutionizing-security-data-integration-with-flexibility-and-choice/>)
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/TripActions_Logo3.png)
Integrating Tarsal into our security operations has been a game-changer. We’ve gone from weeks to minutes in pipeline development time, which has not only improved our operational efficiency but also significantly enhanced our threat detection capabilities. Tarsal has enabled us to take a proactive stance in our security efforts, ensuring our data and systems are protected with the utmost diligence.
Gaurav Begwani
Director of Security, Detection & Response, Navan
[See Case Study](https://www.tarsal.co/<https:/tarsal.co/case-study/navan-and-tarsal-revolutionizing-siem-on-a-modern-data-warehouse-with-rapid-data-ingestion/>)
![Image](https://tarsal.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/2Artboard-1-copy.svg)
Tarsal gives us immense speed, autonomy and agility to ingest critical data sources into our security data lake with just few clicks. What generally takes days to build and maintain, takes under 5 minutes in Tarsal. We now focus on building detections, conducting threat hunts at scale while Tarsal plays the key role of data ingestion and normalizationa prerequisite to building an effective detections and response program.
Kyle Polley
Security Lead, Fintech Industry
## Easily plug in your sources & destinations with our no-code connector library

## Security data, wherever you need it
Use the security data platforms of your choice with Tarsal's automatic normalization and pre-built connectors
### Effortless Data Ingestion
Native connectors and schemas for your most important sources.
### Seamless Load to Anywhere
Data Lakes, SIEMs, XDRs -- wherever you need your data, Tarsal has you covered
# Trusted by
![Image⟨12⟩]
![Image⟨13⟩]
![UpStart Logo⟨14⟩]
## Tarsal is...
### Future-proof
Tarsal's infinite scalability means as your organization grows, Tarsal grows with you. 
### No vendor lock-in
Tarsal makes it easy for you to add or switch where you're sending data -- today's SIEM data is tomorrow's data lake data; all with one-click
### Flexible
Keep your SIEM and gradually migrate analytics over to a data lake. You don't have to rip anything out to use Tarsal. 
### Affordable
Your SIEM is one of the biggest line items in your budget. Use Tarsal to send some or all of that data to your data lake.
### Performant
Some analytics just won't run on your SIEM. Use Tarsal to have query-ready data on a data lake.
### No-Code
No code connection from ANY source to EVERY destination
### Normalized
Data in every destination is nomalized to a standard format, regardless of source formats.
![Image⟨15⟩]
Tarsal is the first highly scalable ETL data pipeline built for security teams. Easily exfil terabytes of data in just just a few clicks, with instant normalization, and route that data to your desired destination.
## Real Impact for Real Teams
Tarsal customer success stories
![Image⟨12⟩]
Managing logs ingested from dozens of SaaS providers, each with its own format, authentication and delivery method is a challenge that required a significant investment of human hours. Tarsal takes away this overhead and enables us to focus on security improvements that are unique to Robinhood. 
David Seidman
Head of Security Operations, Robinhood
See Case Study⟨16⟩
![Image⟨17⟩]
Integrating Tarsal into our security operations has been a game-changer. We’ve gone from weeks to minutes in pipeline development time, which has not only improved our operational efficiency but also significantly enhanced our threat detection capabilities. Tarsal has enabled us to take a proactive stance in our security efforts, ensuring our data and systems are protected with the utmost diligence.
Gaurav Begwani
Director of Security, Detection & Response, Navan
See Case Study⟨18⟩
![Image⟨19⟩]
Tarsal gives us immense speed, autonomy and agility to ingest critical data sources into our security data lake with just few clicks. What generally takes days to build and maintain, takes under 5 minutes in Tarsal. We now focus on building detections, conducting threat hunts at scale while Tarsal plays the key role of data ingestion and normalizationa prerequisite to building an effective detections and response program.
Kyle Polley
Security Lead, Fintech Industry

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tarsal**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S21, Tarsal is a New York-based startup on a mission to transform the way security teams handle their data. As the volume of security data explodes—growing at a staggering 25% annually—a robust data pipeline and infrastructure is not just a nice-to-have; it's crucial. Tarsal steps in to fill that gap, pioneering what they're calling the modern security data stack.

**What Do They Do?**

Tarsal is specifically designed for security teams. It offers a no-code, highly scalable ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) data pipe that seamlessly integrates security data from various sources—including SaaS, cloud, and security logs—into data lakes or SIEMs (Security Information and Event Management systems). Imagine being able to ingest terabytes of data with just a few clicks. That’s the promise here.

The platform boasts features like:
- **Effortless Data Ingestion:** Native connectors and pre-built schemas for major data sources.
- **Seamless Load Anywhere:** Whether it’s a data lake, a SIEM, or an XDR, Tarsal ensures data is routed correctly.
- **Automatic Normalization:** Tarsal normalizes data formats across disparate sources, making it easier to work with.

**The Team**

Tarsal operates with a tight-knit team of 10 employees. At the helm is Group Partner Nan, who along with the team is focused on continually evolving the product to meet customer needs and market demands.

**Customer Impact**

The real magic of Tarsal lies in its user testimonials. Security teams using Tarsal report significant improvements in operational efficiency and threat detection capabilities. Clients like Robinhood and Navan have experienced a drastic reduction in data pipeline development time—from weeks to mere minutes—allowing them to allocate resources towards actual security improvements instead of getting bogged down by data grunt work.

**Why Tarsal?**

- **Future-Proof:** Scales with your organization as data needs grow.
- **No Vendor Lock-In:** Flexibility to choose where and how you send data.
- **Affordable Solutions:** Helps reduce costs associated with storage and analytics by allowing you to offload data into lakes.
- **No-Code Convenience:** Facilitates connections without the need for complex coding.

**Conclusion**

Tarsal is at the forefront of making security data management less of a headache and more of a streamlined operation. If you're part of a security team struggling with data inflow, they offer a free trial to experience the solution firsthand. Check them out at [Tarsal.co](https://www.tarsal.co/) and see how they can simplify your data pipeline! 

In a world where data security is paramount, Tarsal stands out as an essential tool for modern security teams, bridging that crucial gap between data management and security operations.
